column4: Oh no, I forgot to buy an After Pill! What now?
Ugh... Looks like I will have to accept that she might get pregnant.
I want you to take the pill.""
Understandable. We're still children ourselves, we could never hope to raise a child.
Sure, I will take the pill. Do not worry.

column5: I want you to have the baby.""

column4: We're still children, you realize? We could never hope to raise a child ourselves.
Even if you say that, that's just too reckless. I trust you but we shouldn't overestimate ourselves.
We should first finish our schooling, and then get married, and then have children.
….Please. I really want you to have the child. I'll take full responsibility.
….Okay, if you insist so much. If you say you'll take responsibility, then I have no qualms about it.
But you really must, okay? This is serious.
I understand. I won't disappoint you.
…Fufu~, alright then. I won't take the pill.
